dcl_globalFlags refactoringAllowed
dcl_constantbuffer cb0[181], immediateIndexed
dcl_constantbuffer cb1[10], immediateIndexed
dcl_sampler s0, mode_comparison
dcl_sampler s1, mode_default
dcl_sampler s2, mode_default
dcl_resource_texture2d (float,float,float,float) t0

dcl_input_ps linear centroid v1.xyz
dcl_input_ps linear centroid v2.xyz
dcl_input_ps linear centroid v3.xy
dcl_output o0.xyzw
dcl_temps 5

// 3DMigoto StereoParams:
dcl_resource_texture2d (float,float,float,float) t125

ld_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r1.xyzw, l(0, 0, 0, 0), t125.xyzw


// WATCH_DOGS2 Camera Position adjustment inserted with DarkStarSword's asmtool.py:
// asmtool.py --fix-wd2-unproject --fix-wd2-camera-pos -i --only-autofixed 510517242ac53b15-ps.txt

mul r1.w, r1.x, r1.y
mul r3.x, r1.w, cb0[9].x
mul r3.y, r1.w, cb0[10].x
mul r3.z, r1.w, cb0[11].x
mul r3.w, r1.w, cb0[12].x
dp4 r4.x, r3.xyzw, cb0[17].xyzw
dp4 r4.y, r3.xyzw, cb0[18].xyzw
dp4 r4.z, r3.xyzw, cb0[19].xyzw
add r2.xyz, cb0[174].xyz, r4.xyz

add r0.xyz, v0.xyzx, -cb1[9].xxxx
lt r0.xyz, r0.xyzx, l(0.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000)
or r0.x, r0.y, r0.x
or r0.x, r0.z, r0.x
discard_nz r0.x
sample_c_lz_aoffimmi_indexable(0,0,0)(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r0.x, v2.xyxx, t0.xxxx, s0, v2.z
add r0.x, r0.x, l(-0.500000)
lt r0.x, r0.x, l(0.000000)
discard_nz r0.x
sample_b_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r0.x, v3.xyxx, t2.wxyz, s2, cb0[180].x
add_sat r0.x, r0.x, l(0.040000)
sample_b_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r0.y, v3.xyxx, t1.xwyz, s1, cb0[180].x
mul_sat r0.y, r0.y, l(40.000000)
add r0.x, -r0.y, r0.x
mad r0.x, cb1[1].y, r0.x, r0.y
mul o0.xyz, r0.xxxx, v1.xyzx
mov o0.w, l(1.000000)
ret 
// Approximately 18 instruction slots used
